creditline: The James S. Bell Memorial Fund
description: the decoration is simple; a gadrooned band on the low moulded base; beading at the rim and on handles; gadrooned finial, and cut-card decoration of leaves on cover and under handles on body
inscription:
Mark

Engraved within a baroque cartouche are the arms (probably of Holt) impaling another; the latter is now erased.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked near handle.  Makers mark only inside cover.

4 marks on rim; maker\'s mark on cover
title: Cup and cover
